item.description:
AFP's Manchester Volunteer Center opens at 10am on Friday, September 21st. We have free food for volunteers, and great prizes are available through AFP's new contest.

The prize for the top caller in our Citizen Outreach Contest this week is a $50 Amazon Gift Card and the top caller this month gets a free iPad, so stop by for free food and a shot at some great prizes! Full contest rules are available at http://tinyurl.com/8cwmwpm.

Once we are done calling at 8 this Friday night, join us for pizza and a screening of I.O.U.S.A.-

As the United States faces unprecedented financial crises, filmmaker Patrick Creadon explores just how America got to be in the economic mess that it finds itself in, eventually detailing just what the nation would have to do in order to prevent a bad situation from turning into an all-out financial disaster.
item.name: I.O.U.S.A. Screening
